name: Scute Swarm
abilities: Landfall — Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token. If you control six or more lands, create a token that's a copy of Scute Swarm instead.

name: Banshee of the Dread Choir
abilities: Myriad, Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

name: Battle Angels of Tyr
abilities: Flying, myriad, Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card if that player has more cards in hand than each other player. Then you create a Treasure token if that player controls more lands than each other player. Then you gain 3 life if that player has more life than each other player.
